name: Maisie's Color Cave
description:
An 8-bit plattformer-labyrinth. Maisie can run out of light, so be aware that you have to ignite her torch repeatedly, otherwise you have to play in the dark.  Also without glasses, Maisie can't see colors wich is important to know where you can or should go and where not. Find the buttons in the cave to switch or turn off the function of specific colors and find out the right order for switching. Make your way out of the labyrinth so that Maisie can pass the 8-bit-hero-exam...

Controls:

Left/Right: Arrows

Jump: X

Pich up/Use/Close: C

Game Design, Arts, Programming: Kevin Emanuel Osenau

Story: Mareike Dagmar Osenau

Music: Achim Stommel
